Title: Provides that a fentanyl analogue shall be deemed to be a schedule I opiate
Summary: Provides that a fentanyl analogue shall be deemed to be a schedule I opiate.
LawCode: Amd §§3302 & 3306, Pub Health L; amd §220.00, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the penal law, in relation to fentanyl analogues
